answers.answer: It could be a number of things that are wrong.  Since we do not have access to her medial files and cannot diagnose, we cannot say.  Did she have an MRI or CT scan of her brain/head?  Did they check for parasites, meningitis, and other organisms?Is she still in China or in Canada with you?  I suggest you talk with her doctor and ask what is her diagnosis, what did they find on the tests, and ask what is her prognosis (will she get better or not). I wish you the best as I'm sure this is taking an emotional toll on you, but know that we are here to support you.

question: Hello ,My mother is 73 years old. She got fever(40 c) and vomit in July last year in China. In hospital doctors only inject her antibiotic, she got better, then went home.
